message:
Hi. Thanks for the post. I have a question regarding I/O threads (IOCPs).

"Since the library/BCL is using the standard P/Invoke overlapped I/O system, it has already registered the handle with the I/O Completion Port (IOCP), which is part of the thread pool. So an I/O thread pool thread is borrowed briefly to execute the APC, which notifies the task that itâ€™s complete."

Aren't those I/O threads blocked while waiting to be notified to process I/O callbacks?
